paragraphs.content: In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In my distress I cried unto the Lord, and he heard me.

paragraphs.content: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Deliver my soul, O Lord, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.

paragraphs.content: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?
paragraphs.contentHtml: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?

paragraphs.content: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.

paragraphs.content: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
paragraphs.contentHtml: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!

paragraphs.content: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.

paragraphs.content: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
